website_summaries.verdict: Egg crate foam provides the additional support some users crave.
pros: Comes with a removable pillow case
Can be used horizontally or vertically
cons: A few owners say they find it more comfortable for sitting than for sleeping

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rehab sleep product
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my PT. Without it I would not have been able to sleep. This product is ideal to elevate the head from the waist up. OR with slight modification, could be used to elevate the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable pillow for snorers or sinus problem sufferers
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and great for sitting up in bed! It's tall when oriented as seen in the photo, and also props your head up fairly high when laid flat, which is what I was looking for. The curvature is a little wonky when you get an additional pillow involved, though. Might be fine if you don't need an extra pillow under your neck/head.
customer_reviews.author: S. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Be sure this is what you want.  Seller either cannot or will not accept returns.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. Being a "medical product", once tried, seller cannot or will not accept returns. In this case, not a total waste. The cats seem to think that it makes a great bed.
customer_reviews.author: LowRider.clif

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This wedge has worked out quite well. It's firm enough to provide the support I was seeking, but there's still enough "give" so that it doesn't feel like a rock. One thing, however: it definitely needs the cotton cover, which costs extra.
customer_reviews.author: DZL

customer_reviews.title: But I still like
customer_reviews.text: Thought it folded to two positions. But I still like it
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: and this pillow is perfect to sit up in bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of arm and foot injuries that kept me in bed for months, and this pillow is perfect to sit up in bed. It is super comfortable for reading, working on the laptop, or just hanging out in bed. I've also used it for several other purposes, such as elevating my foot, elevating my shoulder, and even to do some leg exercises ! I've been using it for 6 months now and it is not showing any signs of wear. It's also very nice that it came with a washable pillow cover.
customer_reviews.author: Marie-Francoise Hatte

customer_reviews.title: This product helps my husband fall asleep more easily and stay asleep for a longer period of time ...
customer_reviews.text: This product helps my husband fall asleep more easily and stay asleep for a longer period of time without pain. The contoured wedge makes this the most comfortable pillow to use for watching TV or reading in bed for him. Great product at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Delores White

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow for keeping me breathing straight through the night
customer_reviews.text: Best pillow for keeping me breathing straight through the night. The side angles allow me to sleep on my side without pushing on my jaw, which helps if you need to wear a night guard. I add a thin pillow to the top portion and it keeps me from sliding down and adds that bit of comfort while watching TV or reading.
customer_reviews.author: JP Smith

customer_reviews.title: BETTER SLEEPING!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sleeping pillow if you have issue sleeping flat or have breathing issues.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Deal

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for better sleep
customer_reviews.text: This is a great solution for snoring and acid re flux - seriously. Just lifting your upper body helps both of us sleep much better!!
customer_reviews.author: Sioux Citizen

customer_reviews.title: ... a total knee replacement and this has been a wonderful aid.
customer_reviews.text: Had a total knee replacement and this has been a wonderful aid.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Jackson

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: This works, its comfortable and does what its intended to do. Its a pleasure buying something and getting what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Gennie Messado

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for me
customer_reviews.text: This was ok. It would be better if it were wider and I'm a slim adult with a medium build frame (bones). I didn't sleep well on this and got rid of it after one use. It may be great for others, but unfortunately wasn't comfortable for me. I ended up ordering this productand love it despite the cost being much higher. It's much wider and has a more gradual and extended ramp. I use this in conjunction with my cpap machine.
customer_reviews.author: Windchimes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable to sit up and read, but not comfortable to lie down, as it rolls your shoulders inward.
customer_reviews.author: gail

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helps me with a little more comfort while watching T.V. !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
